io.druid.indexing.overlord

Class TaskQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.indexing.overlord.TaskQueue

  • public class TaskQueue
extends Object
    Interface between task producers and the task runner. This object accepts tasks from producers using add(io.druid.indexing.common.task.Task) and manages delivery of these tasks to a TaskRunner. Tasks will run in a mostly-FIFO order, with deviations when the natural next task is not ready in time (based on its Task.isReady(io.druid.indexing.common.actions.TaskActionClient) method). For persistence, we save all new tasks and task status changes using a TaskStorage object.
